name: Cold Cold Chasm Climber
description:
My submission for Mini Jam 128.

Didn't use the "Health" theme, but still used the limitation "The Only Way to Go is Up"

Your goal in this game is to climb out of the iceberg chasm before it melts out from beneath you. Inspired by Spelunky, you'll be jumping, climbing and grappling up an icy cave-scape. 

Kinda got rushed towards the end due to work, so enjoy free climbing lol.

Controls

Arrows - Move

Z or Up - Jump

C - Hold for Menu, press an arrow to select an item

ESC to exit

Movement is grid based, this was to save time making physics, it takes a second to get used to.
